monster: Edac: Male Elf, 4th-level Fighter, N. Edac has a long face, with white hair and hazel eyes. He wears plate mail and wields a spear and shield. Edac is proud and mischievous.
Waldu: Male Human, 4th-level Cleric, CN. Waldu is common in appearance, with uneven silver hair and amber eyes. He wears splint mail and wields a quarterstaff. Waldu lost his shadow to a nymph.
Ralphye: Male Human, 4th-level Fighter, N. Ralphye has a round face, with red hair and hazel eyes. He wears plate mail and wields a spear and shield. Ralphye is modest and mischievous.

monster: Elet: Female Human, 4th-level Magic-User, LE. Elet has a square face, with brown hair and light grey eyes. She wears modest garments and wields a dagger. Elet dislikes anyone bigger than her.

Berga: Female Human, 4th-level Fighter, CE. Berga has a square face, with grey hair and narrow hazel eyes. She wears plate mail and wields a battle axe and shield. Berga is easily distracted by magic.
Leise: Female Human, 4th-level Cleric, LE. Leise is tall and thin, with thick brown hair and hazel eyes. She wears banded mail and wields a footman's flail. Leise blames trolls for every misfortune.
Wearde: Male Human, 4th-level Magic-User, NE. Wearde is thin, with straight red hair and large brown eyes. He wears red robes and wields a dagger and darts. Wearde is insane and violent.
Mira: Male Half-orc, 4th-level Fighter, NE. Mira is heavyset, with brown hair and grey eyes. He wears splint mail and wields a morning star and composite short bow. Mira is fascinated by death.

monster: Wine: Male Human, 4th-level Fighter, LE. Wine has a long face, with cropped silver hair and brown eyes. He wears banded mail and wields a hammer and shield. Wine is possessive, and has a golden ring which he treasures above all else.
Burheue: Female Human, 4th-level Fighter, CE. Burheue has a long face, with long grey hair and bright green eyes. She wears banded mail and wields a hammer. Burheue is cynical and anxious.

Nimrie: Female Half-elf, 4th-level Magic-User, CE. Nimrie is fair in appearance, with short golden hair and narrow brown eyes. She wears well-made clothing and wields a quarterstaff and darts. Nimrie is impatient, and actually might not understand how time works.

Several iron cages are scattered throughout the room, and a pile of barrel staves lies in the south side of the room

east.desc: Trapped and Locked Stone Door (good lock, -10% to open)

detail.room_features: The ceiling is covered with bloodstains, and a pile of sundered shields lies in the west side of the room

west.desc: Trapped and Locked Stone Door (good lock, -10% to open)

detail.room_features: A wooden ladder rests against the east wall, and someone has scrawled "Elen Lipsev was here" on the west wall

east.desc: Secret Trapped and Unlocked Iron Door
east.secret: The door is located above a small stone dais and concealed by an illusion
east.trap: Contact Poison Trap (onset immediate, save or die)

north.secret: A bookcase and section of wall pivots open when a command word is spoken

detail.room_features: A narrow pit covered by iron bars lies in the south side of the room, and the walls are covered with claw marks

west.desc: Locked Iron Door (superior lock, -20% to open)

detail.room_features: A mural of vile acts covers the ceiling, and someone has scrawled "Praise the Wraith Duke" on the south wall
The floor is covered in square tiles, alternating white and black, and a mouldy odor fills the room
The floor is covered in square tiles, alternating white and black, and a cube of solid stone stands in the north-west corner of the room
Someone has scrawled "Trespassers will be flayed alive" in blood on the west wall, and the sound of horns can be heard in the north side of the room

north.desc: Locked Stone Door (good lock, -10% to open) (slides down)

detail.room_features: Burning torches in iron sconces line the east wall, and someone has scrawled "Has anyone seen my invisible cloak?" on the west wall
Several headless statues are scattered throughout the room, and a pile of iron spikes lies in the north side of the room
A chute descends from the room into a natural cavern below, and someone has scrawled "The Ring of Mist shall be restored when the moon is crowned" on the west wall

east.desc: Secret Trapped and Unlocked Stone Door
east.secret: The door is opened by speaking a command word

detail.room_features: Numerous pillars line the south wall, and a mural of a god of storms covers the ceiling
A magical mirror on the east wall answers questions with lies and falsehoods, and several headless statues are scattered throughout the room
A magical mosaic on the south wall depicts the gruesome death of whomever views it, and a narrow ledge runs along the north and east walls
A group of draconic faces have been carved into the south wall, and a swarm of crawling insects covers the floor
Someone has scrawled a basic map of the dungeon on the north wall, and a rusted chain lies in the north side of the room

west.desc: Secret Trapped and Unlocked Stone Door
west.secret: The door is opened by speaking a command word
A trap door in the floor leads to a short tunnel beneath the wall

detail.room_features: A well lies in the north-west corner of the room, and a crude bookcase and iron gong sit in the south-east corner of the room
Several headless statues are scattered throughout the room, and a crushed helm lies in the south-west corner of the room

south.desc: Trapped and Locked Stone Door (superior lock, -20% to open)

detail.room_features: A rotting carpet and simple cabinet sit in the west side of the room, and a pile of bent copper coins lies in the east side of the room
The sound of horns can be heard in the west side of the room, and several pieces of blood-soaked clothing are scattered throughout the room
The scent of ozone fills the south side of the room, and a pile of sundered shields lies in the center of the room
A stair ascends to a catwalk hanging between the north and south walls, and several pieces of torn paper are scattered throughout the room

east.secret: A trap door in the floor leads to a short tunnel beneath the wall

detail.room_features: A tile mosaic of arcane patterns covers the floor, and several headless statues are scattered throughout the room
A wooden ladder rests against the west wall, and patches of mushrooms grow in the east side of the room
A cube of solid stone stands in the west side of the room, and a clicking noise can be heard in the west side of the room
A stone dais sits in the north-west corner of the room, and a faded and torn tapestry hangs from the west wall

east.trap: Poison Dart Trap (1d4 damage plus poison; onset immediate, save or die)

west.secret: A section of wall pivots open when a command word is spoken

detail.room_features: A toppled statue lies in the north side of the room, and the ceiling is covered with cracks
A wooden platform hangs over a deep pit in the center of the room, and several adventurer corpses are scattered throughout the room
The room has a high domed ceiling, and someone has scrawled "You cannot kill it with wizardry" on the north wall

south.secret: The door is concealed behind a tapestry of arcane patterns

detail.room_features: A faded and torn tapestry hangs from the west wall, and someone has scrawled "Run away!" on the east wall
Several headless statues are scattered throughout the room, and a corpse lies in front of an open chest in the south-west corner of the room
A large kiln and coal bin sit in the south side of the room, and someone has scrawled "The Conclave of Bata looted this place" on the west wall

east.desc: Secret Locked Iron Door (good lock, -10% to open)
east.secret: The door is concealed within the mouth of a demonic face carved from stone

detail.room_features: Screaming can be heard in the north-east corner of the room, and a pile of iron blobs lies in the south side of the room
A stone stair ascends towards the south wall, and an iron chandelier hangs from the ceiling in the south side of the room
The floor is covered in perfect hexagonal tiles, and a charred wooden chest lies in the south-west corner of the room

east.desc: Locked Iron Door (good lock, -10% to open)

detail.room_features: A mural of geometric patterns covers the ceiling, and a carved stone statue stands in the south-west corner of the room
A narrow shaft falls into the room from above, and the south and east walls are covered with veins of metal
A narrow pit covered by iron bars lies in the east side of the room, and someone has scrawled "The Blade of Knowledge is reforged" on the east wall

south.desc: Locked Stone Door (superior lock, -20% to open)

detail.room_features: A faded and torn tapestry hangs from the north wall, and a toppled statue lies in the north-east corner of the room

south.desc: Locked Stone Door (good lock, -10% to open)

detail.room_features: Several alcoves are cut into the north and east walls, and various torture devices are scattered throughout the room

east.secret: The door is located above a small stone dais and opened by twisting an iron sconce

monster: Gili: Female Dwarf, 4th-level Magic-User, CG. Gili has black hair and brown eyes. She wears travel-stained clothing and wields a dagger and darts. Gili is well-spoken but combative.
Stomes: Male Human, 4th-level Fighter, NG. Stomes has a long face, with red hair and dark blue eyes. He wears plate mail and wields a fauchard-fork. Stomes is competitive and daring.
Westio: Male Human, 4th-level Magic-User, CG. Westio is elegant in appearance, with copper hair and amber eyes. He wears sturdy clothing and wields a dagger. Westio dislikes physical contact.
Wena: Female Human, 4th-level Fighter, NG. Wena is short, with silver hair and soft green eyes. She wears splint mail and wields a fauchard-fork. Wena has a traumatic fear of mirrors.
detail.room_features: The floor is covered in perfect hexagonal tiles, and the south and east walls are covered with veins of red crystal

north.secret: The door is concealed within the mouth of a gargantuan skull carved from stone

monster: Mesym: Male Human, 4th-level Cleric, CN. Mesym has a long face, with auburn hair and large amber eyes. He wears plate mail and wields a hammer. Mesym has an acute fear of magic and arcana.

Kamil: Male Dwarf, 4th-level Magic-User, LN. Kamil is tall and stout, with thick auburn hair and dark hazel eyes. He wears expensive clothing and wields a quarterstaff and dagger. Kamil lost his shadow to a hag.
Gyles: Male Human, 4th-level Fighter, CN. Gyles has a long face, with thin black hair and brown eyes. He wears plate mail and wields a military fork. Gyles is colorblind.
Brada: Female Human, 4th-level Thief, CN. Brada is short, with black hair and brown eyes. She wears leather armor and wields a club and sling. Brada is loyal but destructive.

Withiue: Female Human, 4th-level Druid, N. Withiue has an angular face, with cropped grey hair and grey eyes. She wears leather armor and wields a scimitar. Withiue was raised by cultists of the Jade King.
detail.room_features: A magical statue in the south-east corner of the room answers questions with insults, and a stone dais and throne sits in the north side of the room
A wooden ladder rests against the east wall, and numerous monstrous skulls lie within niches in the south wall
The ceiling is covered with cracks, and a pile of rotten rope lies in the east side of the room
A stone stair ascends towards the west wall, and a sundered shield lies in the south-east corner of the room
The floor is covered in square tiles, alternating white and black, and lit candles are scattered across the floor

east.secret: The door is concealed within an upright sarcophagus

north.secret: The door is concealed behind a tapestry of arcane patterns

detail.room_features: A carved stone statue stands in the center of the room, and the south and east walls are covered with slime

detail.room_features: A stream of oil flows along a channel in the floor, and a bent key lies in the south-west corner of the room

wandering_monsters.1: 2 x Gargoyle, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.2: 2 x Shrieker, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.3: 10 x Stirge, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.4: 1 x Gray Ooze, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.5: 3 x Shadow, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.6: 11 x Goblin, actively patrolling their territory
